text: hananimkkeseo haneul-eul hyanghan geu daeui eolgul-eul bogo iss-eossnola geudae ga wonhaneun gidoui banghyang-eul hyanghage halila geudaeui gogaeleul yeong-wonhan gyeong baeui jangsolo hyanghala eodie issdeun geu jjog-eulo gogaeleul hyanghaljini seongseo leul gyesibad-eun ideul-eun i gyesiga geu deul-ui junim-eulobuteo on jinsil-ilaneun geos-eul algo iss-eumyeo hananim-eun geudeul i haneungeos-e daehae moleuneun bun-i a nisila
